changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.0:
- Added very basic Friends List feature, allowing you to view up to five of your friends at a time.
- User Guides coming soon!
- Further code reorganization/improvements.

- Upon receiving a "COULD NOT RETRIEVE DATA" error, users may now re-attempt to load their profile data by clicking their Pebble's middle (Select) button.
- Small code improvements to organize and clean the program.

Build 0.75: Initial Published Release - Users may securely link their Steam profiles to their Pebble through Steam's OpenID authentication services. After successfully logging in through Steam, click the Save button to complete the process. Currently, users can currently view their general profile information. User guides will formally be added in the next release, and Friends List functionality is currently in the works. Program code will be cleaned and optimized as development continues.

data.description: Wrist Steam is a free, open-source application built to help bridge the gap between Pebble users and their Steam profiles. In development since mid-2014, Wrist Steam allows you to safely - and conveniently - link your Steam user profile to Wrist Steam via Steam's OpenID authentication service. As of right now, Wrist Steam allows you to view your own profile info, but more features are in the works, such as Friends Info (allowing you to see and track your friends activities within Steam), and (possibly) Wrist-TF2, a feature which could allow you to track your TF2 inventory on the go!
